nodes.text: Var-Nok was a male Weequay bodyguard of the Cult of the Screaming Blade leader Paladius. In 3643 BBY he and Shar-Nok engaged Kallig alongside their master, but were defeated and killed.
Var-Nok appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on the planet Nar Shaddaa.
